svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_12_5) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/60.0.3112.90 Safari/537.36" version="7.0.8" editor="www.draw.io" type="device"><diagram id="4223be1c-6618-c9da-35e3-746af41bd6c6" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Yanone Kaffeesatz"; color: rgb(153, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 598px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

font.font: [Sievert Consulting] worked for us under contract to develop the R package

. We are very pleased with the finished product. The design captures well the simplicity we want for scientists, so that they don't need to know the details of mapping in R. Though it was not in the original specifications, he also added the ability to animate maps through time, and worked with us after the contract was finished to resolve unforeseen issues.
